task.title: How to Create feature files
task.shortdesc: To run your test you need steps to be followed. In the future files you will write down your steps. Every web page in the given web site needs a separate feature file.

context.p: You will learn how to create feature files :

step.cmd: Create a separate folder for the feature files in the project
Click with the right button of the mouse on the folder
Name the file in the name field

result.p: You will be able to write down your tests.

taskbody.example: You want to create a couple of tests for a Login.
